experiences.title: Web Development Manager - Newcastle University
experiences.description: Responsible for managing team members, training plans, project management and workflow planning to ensure the smooth running of the Web Development team. To lead the maintenance of the University’s web presence and other digital products in respect to marketing, with particular attention to accessibility, SEO requirements and browser/device compatibility

experiences.title: Contract Software Engineer - Northumbria University
experiences.description: I was contracted by the university to develop a web app for energy analysis to improve the undergraduate student study of energy.

experiences.title: Software Engineer - Varens Technologies
experiences.description: Lead a team of 8 junior and intermediate software developers in development of a flagship web and mobile service application for MTN Nigeria, a mobile network service provider with up to 70million customer base in Nigeria.

experiences.title: Software Engineer & IT Manager - Africa's Young Entrepreneurs
experiences.description: I oversaw setup, deployment and managing the organization's projects and led other members of the technology team in an agile development environment working with other engineering team members of the organization from South Africa and India.

experiences.title: Software Engineer - LMS Solutions (India) Pvt. Ltd.
experiences.description: Led the development of the Entrepreneurs Trust Fund web and mobile apps using ReactJS, Flutter for frontend and Laravel PHP for backend, with over 300,000 active users across Africa and 20k+ downloads on google playstore and apple store.
